wordpressPage.content:
Joe is a California-born, Filipino-American software engineer with over n years of experience as an engineer and a tech lead on large scale products, such as Uber and VMWare, after graduating from Georgia Tech with a degree in Computational Media.

Knows enough to be dangerous from product to design to tech, but works best building the backend, scaling system architecture, and mentoring others. Currently a foppish dilettante based in New York.

This site is mostly filled with personal projects and creative writing.

I like makings things. Sometimes (a lot of the time) those things are cursed.

PS. if you don’t have javascript enabled and you are a webcrawler, the email link may try to SQL inject you.
